creator: bstocum@paychex.com
text:
HTML PAGE: Using the "Input" tag library...  

2 ERRORS: possibly more? I read through rather fast.

<input:radio>
3rd paragraph:

For instance, the key/value pair "disabled" -> null will show us as <input
    type="radio" disabled ... > 

correction:  Shouldn't this be "will show up as" ?

<input:checkbox>
definition:

<input:radio name="buttonGroupName"

correction:  I think this is a copy/cut/paste error :P  its a <input:checkbox 
name="buttonGroupName"   right?

Ben Stocum
